import React, { useRef, useState } from 'react' import './App.css' import { useEffect } from 'react' const App = () => { const [player,setPlayer]= useState({isTrue:false}) const audioPlayer = useRef() const start =()=>{ setPlayer(pre=>pre) player.isTrue? audioPlayer.current.pause() : audioPlayer.current.play() } return (
) } export default App
